name: players_photo
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool soccerway_feed.
Tool description: Soccerway covers over 1000 football leagues & cups from 134+ countries. It is the worldâ€™s largest football database. Data without delay, instant update. Historical data since 1901.  **Site:** [soccerway.com](https://int.soccerway.com/)  **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other sports api:** https://rapi.one
API description: Retrieves the photo of a soccer player given the player's ID using the Soccerway API.

player_id.description: The unique identifier of the soccer player.
